notes:
Mahrdis was sentenced to be locked away, after his part in the conspiracies against the pharaoh [[Arkhotep]].

{{JSpoiler|One of the Pharaohs of [[The Ancient Tombs Quest]].}}
sounds: The eternal flame demands its due!
name: Mahrdis
behaviour: Malicious, will make all efforts to destroy intruders.
strategy: He attacks with fire, so [[blocker]]s should try to distract him and move fast, while [[mage]]s and [[paladin]]s attack from far. He is guarded by 3 [[Dragon]]s, a [[Dragon Lord]] and 4 [[Flamethrower]]s.
